Texts.Chs: 啊，血肉之躯，你是最为不寻常的。我的谢恩如甘霖般降在你的身上，而碎片的荣光将永远照耀你的灵魂。
Texts.Eng: Ah, most exceptional, fleshling. My gratitude showers upon you, and the glory of the Shards will shine on your soul forevermore.

Texts.Chs: 把一盏^orange;结晶奖杯^reset;带给^green;宝石商店^reset;(位于^orange;科学前哨站^reset;)
Texts.Eng: Bring a ^orange;Crystalline Trophy^reset; to the ^green;Gem Shop^reset; at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Texts.Chs: 美好的一天，碳与血肉之存在。我想知道你是否愿意帮助这个厄修安龙人？我在寻找一盏具有辉煌外观的^orange;结晶奖杯^reset;。我听说它们可以在^orange;古老寺庙^reset;中被找到。如果你找到了一个，我会就你的努力给予丰厚回报的。
Texts.Eng: Good day, being of carbon and flesh. I wonder if you might give aid to this Eld'uukhar? I seek the glorious aspect of a ^orange;Crystalline Trophy^reset;. I've heard that they can be found in ^orange;Ancient Temples^reset;. If you find one, I would reward you handsomely for your efforts.
